data.text:
One of the most beloved actors on Mexican television is Eduardo Capetillo, because in addition to his talent, for many he has been the example that a marriage can last for many years.

And the fact is that the actor wears nothing more and nothing less than 28 years with his wife Biby Gaytán, with whom he also has five children.

You can also read: Brian needs surgery to save his life; he knows his story

Although for years his life has been kept out of the scandal and they are an exemplary family, it seems that not everything is rosy for Eduardo, because a few months ago he confessed that he had skin cancer.

It’s been a while since this unfortunate news, and recently the actor shared with his audience how healthy he feels, because we know that this is a disease that has no limits.

Due to the details that he has shared, Capetillo assures that he must protect himself all the time with sunscreens, take care of his diet and not expose himself too much to the sun’s rays.

Maybe you’re interested: Boy asks the Magi for health for his little brother with cancer

Despite his illness, the actor is a great example to follow, as he continues to work and fight every day to feel better.

In fact, he is back on the small screen, after nine years since his last appearance on television, the actor participated in the telenovela with series format ‘Where there was fire’, produced by the Netflix platform.

Without a doubt, with this project, it is expected that the former Timbiriche can recover his great popularity and success that he achieved as the protagonist of remembered soap operas such as: ‘Marimar’, ‘Dance with me’ and ‘Reach for a star’.

Although his health could affect the actor’s return to entertainment activities, since in June 2021, the singer also revealed that he had skin cancer, he announced it as part of a video on his YouTube channel. daughters, during a makeup application dynamic.

We recommend: Young man shaves with his mother with cancer, video goes viral

“White-skinned people should be very careful with the sun’s rays, I want to tell you, dear friends, that this is a first here on my daughters’ channel, I got skin cancer from sunbathing so much and then my dermatologist, who is a person I love very much, my dear Olga Labastida, she told me ‘you will never get a ray of sunlight again’” said.

This confession caused a stir and the concern of his followers, which caused Bibi Gaytán’s husband to delve a little deeper into the subject from his social networks.

“A few years ago I had a malignant melanoma (cancer) removed, this was an isolated episode and was the product of excessive exposure to sunlight WITHOUT proper protection”commented on an Instagram post.

You can also read: Trials of the first human breast cancer vaccine begin

He added: “I get checked once a year and so far everything is fine fortunately. For me there is no more sun and when there is, with a lot of sun protection. If the proper precautions are taken, there is no reason to go through that again, thank you.”
